Description:
You go down the stairs of the temples but they start to flood because of the waterfalls.

At some point you underestimate the power of the water current and it begins to carry you away.

A few meters away from you there is the great waterfall of Aquarfall, you cannot afford to fall down it or you will end up dead.
DescriptionAction: Now you can only improvise how to get out of the water, unless one of you prepared in advance.
